settings.content: DAMED glitter products derive from the phrase “To get Damed”, as to, “Be Mad Damed” as an extension of Mad Dame’s glitter adorned photo shoot portraits.

settings.title: GET DAMED
settings.subheading: #getdamed: To have an outer skin created to reflect your inner essence.

settings.text: DAMED GLITTER products are hand made with love and intention. You are a part of the Glitter Army, that spreads love, joy and transformation when you wear and share the glitter love.
